languages.text: {n}Присмотревшись, вы замечаете небольшие судороги, время от времени пробегающие по телу техножреца. Вероятно, какой-то из проводов, опутывающих мертвеца, поврежден и тревожит бездыханное тело ударами Движущей силы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Присмотревшись, вы замечаете, что время от времени по телу техножреца пробегают небольшие судороги. Судя по всему, они непроизвольны и вызваны подключенным к телу током.{/n}

languages.text: {n}As you look closer, you note that small tremors run through the Tech-Priest's body every now and then. There must be a faulty wire in the tangle around the dead man, sending Motive Force shocks through his lifeless shell.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Присмотревшись, вы замечаете небольшие судороги, время от времени пробегающие по телу техножреца. Вероятно, какой-то из проводов, опутывающих мертвеца, поврежден и тревожит бездыханное тело ударами Движущей силы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}As you look closer, you note that small cramps run through the Tech-Priest's body every now and then. There must be a faulty wire in the tangle around the dead man, sending Motive Force shocks through his lifeless shell.{/n}

{n}As you look closer, you note that small cramps run through the Tech-Priest's body every now and then. There must be a faulty wire in the tangle around the dead man, sending Motive Force shocks through his lifeless shell.{/n}

{n}As you look closer, you note that small cramps run through the Tech-Priest's body every now and then. There must be a faulty wire in the tangle around the dead man, sending Motive Force shocks through his lifeless shell.{/n}

{n}As you look closer, you note that small cramps run through the Tech-Priest's body every now and then. There must be a faulty wire in the tangle around the dead man, sending Motive Force shocks through his lifeless shell.{/n}

{n}As you look closer, you note that small tremors run through the Tech-Priest's body every now and then. There must be a faulty wire in the tangle around the dead man, sending Motive Force shocks through his lifeless shell.{/n}

{n}As you look closer, you note that small tremors run through the Tech-Priest's body every now and then. There must be a faulty wire in the tangle around the dead man, sending Motive Force shocks through his lifeless shell.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als du näher hinsiehst, erkennst du, dass immer wieder ein leichtes Zittern den Körper des Techpriesters durchfährt. In dem Gewirr um den Toten herum muss es einen defekten Draht geben, der Antriebskraftschocks durch seine leblose Hülle jagt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you look closer, you note that small tremors run through the Tech-Priest's body every now and then. There must be a faulty wire in the tangle around the dead man, sending Motive Force shocks through his lifeless shell.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als du näher hinsiehst, erkennst du, dass immer wieder kleine Krämpfe den Körper des Techpriesters durchzucken. In dem Gewirr um den Toten herum muss es einen defekten Draht geben, der Antriebskraftschocks durch seine leblose Hülle jagt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}En y regardant de plus près, vous remarquez que le corps du technoprêtre est régulièrement secoué de légers spasmes... Il doit y avoir un court-circuit dans l'enchevêtrement de câbles qui entoure le cadavre et qui envoie des électrochocs de Force Motrice dans son enveloppe sans vie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you look closer, you note that small tremors run through the Tech-Priest's body every now and then. There must be a faulty wire in the tangle around the dead man, sending Motive Force shocks through his lifeless shell.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En y regardant de plus près, vous remarquez que le corps du technoprêtre est régulièrement pris de légers spasmes... Il doit y avoir un câblage défectueux dans l'enchevêtrement de câbles qui entoure le cadavre et qui envoie des électrochocs de Force Motrice dans son enveloppe sans vie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你仔细观察，发现技术神甫的尸体偶尔会发生的轻微的痉挛。缠绕在尸体上的电线大概是出了点问题，从中泄漏出的源力一直在电击这具了无生命的躯壳。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you look closer, you note that small tremors run through the Tech-Priest's body every now and then. There must be a faulty wire in the tangle around the dead man, sending Motive Force shocks through his lifeless shell.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你仔细观察，发现技术祭司的尸体偶尔会发生的轻微的痉挛。缠绕在尸体上的电线大概是出了点问题，从中泄漏出的原初动力一直在电击这具了无生命的躯壳。{/n}

languages.text: {n}よくよく観察すると、技術司祭の遺体全体が時々けいれんしていることに気づく。死者のあちこちに絡まったケーブルに問題があるのは確実で、動力を送っては反応のない男の殻全体にショックを与えているのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you look closer, you note that small tremors run through the Tech-Priest's body every now and then. There must be a faulty wire in the tangle around the dead man, sending Motive Force shocks through his lifeless shell.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}よくよく観察すると、技術司祭の遺体の全身が時々けいれんしていることにあなたは気づく。死者のあちこちに絡まったケーブルに問題があるのは確実で、動力を送っては反応のない男の殻全体にショックを与えている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Al mirar más de cerca, notas que pequeños temblores recorren el cuerpo del tecnosacerdote de vez en cuando. Debe haber un cable defectuoso en la maraña que rodea al cadáver, enviando descargas de Fuerza Motriz a través de su cuerpo sin vida.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you look closer, you note that small tremors run through the Tech-Priest's body every now and then. There must be a faulty wire in the tangle around the dead man, sending Motive Force shocks through his lifeless shell.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Al mirar más de cerca, notas que pequeños calambres recorren el cuerpo del Tecnosacerdote de vez en cuando. Debe haber un cable defectuoso en la maraña que rodea al cadáver, enviando descargas de Fuerza Motriz a través de su cuerpo sin vida.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yakından baktığında Tekno Rahip'in cesedinin ara sıra titrediğini fark ediyorsun. Ölü adamı sarmalayan kablolardan biri arızalı olup cansız bedenine Devinim Gücü şokları gönderiyor olmalı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you look closer, you note that small tremors run through the Tech-Priest's body every now and then. There must be a faulty wire in the tangle around the dead man, sending Motive Force shocks through his lifeless shell.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yakından baktığında Tekno Rahip'in cesedinin ara sıra titrediğini fark ediyorsun. Ölü adamı sarmalayan kablolardan biri arızalı olup cansız bedenine Devinim Gücü şokları gönderiyor olmalı.{/n}
